<h2>We are HostCram LLC,</h2>
a US based Wyoming registered company (Filling ID 2016-000736577) posting our Managed  VPS Hosting offer on Low End Talk.

**Our company registration can be [verified here](https://wyobiz.wy.gov/business/FilingDetails.aspx?eFNum=153014087255104045146212210168127209107237105253).**

<h2>Our Managed VPS Hosting services includes:</h2>

100% Uptime SLA

24/7 Managed Support

New York, US Location

Standard DDoS Protection

Proxmox VE Control Panel

Full Root Access

<h2>MVPS-2G_Special</h2>

    1 vCPU Core
    2 GB DDR3 RAM
    40 GB DISK SPACE
    1000 GB Bandwidth
    1 Dedicated IPv4

Price: $7 month / $84 Year

**[Order Now](https://my.hostcram.com/order/config/index/special-offers/?group_id=16&pricing_id=374)**

_Our terms of service can be found [here](https://www.hostcram.com/tos)._

<h2>Accepted primary payment methods:</h2>
Credit Cards, PayPal, Payoneer, Bitcoin, Altcoin and Bank Transfer (Ask for others)

<h2>Server Configuration:</h2>

Intel Xeon E3/E5 Processor

32/64 GB DDR3 ECC RAM

2-6 Raid Protected Drives

1 Gbps Premium Bandwidth

**Limited stock available. All questions are answerable via [support ticket](https://my.hostcram.com/dashboard/plugin/support_managerpro/client_tickets/add/1/) and [messenger](https://m.me/hostcram). Don't forget to read our [TOS](https://www.hostcram.com/tos), [AUP](https://www.hostcram.com/aup) & [Privacy Policy](https://www.hostcram.com/privacy-policy) before signup. Thanks.**
